meanings.definition: The state or fact of existing, occurring, or being present in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Her presence in the room was comforting to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The presence of the sun made the day brighter.
meanings.sent3: His absence made his presence felt even more.
meanings.sent4: The presence of laughter filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the mountain loomed large over the valley.

meanings.definition: The impressive manner or appearance of a person.
meanings.sent1: His commanding presence demanded attention from all.
meanings.sent2: The actor's presence on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: Her presence at the party made heads turn.
meanings.sent4: The presence of confidence radiated from her every move.
meanings.sent5: The presence of elegance in her dress was undeniable.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is present in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The security guard's presence ensured safety in the building.
meanings.sent2: The presence of the statue added beauty to the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat's presence on the couch surprised the dog.
meanings.sent4: The presence of the old oak tree provided shade in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the teacher in the classroom brought order to the students.
